original_text: So think about a person who has turned against the Son of God. That person's punishment will surely be much worse! He says that Christ's sacrifice has no value for him. He has made God's new agreement seem like something bad. It was Christ's death on the cross that made that person clean, so that he belonged to God. But now that person has insulted God's Spirit, who brings God's kind help to us. So think about a person who has turned against the Son of God. That person's punishment will surely be much worse! korean_text: 하물며 하나님의 아들을 짓밟고 자기를 거룩하게 한 언약의 피를 부정한 것으로 여기고 은혜의 성령을 욕되게 하는 자가 당연히 받을 형벌은 얼마나 더 무겁겠느냐 너희는 생각하라

sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 한 사람에 대해 생각해 보십시오

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그리스도의 희생이 자신에게 아무 가치가 없다고 말합니다

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님의 새 언약을 나쁜 것처럼 보이게 했습니다
